Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the Akron neighborhood Goodyear Heights, this building has excellent visibility at a signalized, six-point intersection.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Formerly a Walgreens, this 15,120 sq. ft. building was built in 2000. Includes a drive-thru window and adequate parking. Situated on 1.26 acres.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Freestanding Retail for Lease or Ground Lease

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: End-cap space available, in white box condition, with a new HVAC unit to be installed upon lease executio

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Pylon signage is available
Over 12,500 vehicles pass the property daily
Along an Akron METRO route

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Situated in East Akron near the Akron Fulton International Airport. Less than one mile to I-77, I -277 and SR-8.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Under new ownership, this shopping center has in-line and end-cap spaces available with excellent visibility along the busy S Arlington Street corridor. Improvements all in the past 12 months include:
− The building façade has been renovated
− New parking lot lighting has been installed
− New pylon signage is available
− The roof has been replaced
− New lighting under the façade canopy
− New security cameras
− Parking lot improvements scheduled for summer of 2021

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: 6,000 SF Retail space directly across from Gojo's HQ at Canal Place in Akron, Ohio.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Canal Place is a 1 million square foot mixed-use development of historic BFGoodrich Rubber Factory at the gateway to downtown Akron.
65,000 SF+ office, 65 multifamily units, 2 craft breweries and more!
Canal Place is adjacent to GOJO Industries 213,000 SF world headquarters with 2,500 employees on site
Canal Place Phase 1 is home to R.Shea Brewing and Missing Falls Brewery in phase 1 of the development.
The site is close proximity to university of Akron (25,000 + enrollment).
The space is expandable up to 6,000 SF directly on S Main across from the GOJO front entrance.
The space has expansive ceiling heights ideal for a brewery / restaurant.
Abundant FREE public parking across the street and throughout the complex, which is a rare feature for an urban mixed-use project.
The space currently does not have a storefront which would allow the Tenant to create an exciting customizable storefront.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Canal Place is a 1 million square foot mixed-use development of historic BFGoodrich Rubber Factory at the gateway to downtown Akron.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: +/- 6,000 SF (DIRECTLY ACROSS FROM GOJO’S HQ) Canal Place is truly a special place. It’s an extraordinary community of companies in a setting rich with industrial heritage: its tie to the BFGoodrich company dating back to 1871 and its contribution to the livelihood of thousands of people make this property a landmark in Akron, Ohio. To fully appreciate Canal Place, one must acknowledge its proud past, its role in the community and the groundwork it has laid for an exciting future.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: CP-Bldg 10 South Main Entry-Prelim Sketch-Opt A.jpg

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: EXCLUSIVE RETAIL / RESTAURANT SPACE AT CANAL PLACE - AKRON’S MOST EXCITING MIXED-USE DEVELOPMENT

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Highland Square is a dynamic urban neighborhood, home to a remarkable collection of unique shops, tempting restaurants, entertainment, convenient personal & public services, yet close to downtown Akron. This thriving historical arts district is supported by both new youthful residents and longtime, committed community members.

Grand Marketplace is a longtime fixture in the Highland Square Neighborhood offering a street front suite for lease. Other personal service providers in the complex include H&R Block, yoga studio, hair salon, laundromat and piercing studio.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
+ Warm white box of 3,028 SF – Can divide to two suites 1,199 SF and 1,829 SF

+ Street front entrance with easily accessible parking

+ Landlord to provide all systems in good working order and will provide finished restrooms

+ Ready for final design and finishes

+ Monument signage available

+ Tenant to pay for all utilities

+ Rental Rate is $12 per SF plus CAM (est. $2.09/SF)

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Highland Square is a dynamic urban neighborhood, home to a remarkable collection of unique shops, tempting restaurants, entertainment, convenient personal & public services, yet close to downtown Akron. This thriving historical arts district is supported by both new youthful residents and longtime, committed community members.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Westmark Building is long time home to Aladdin’s Restaurant and other tenants. This building has a private parking lot off West Market Street with two stairs accessing the second level. The second floor, a former dance studio space is now available for lease. Existing space configuration includes three large studios/rooms, three offices, waiting area and restrooms in this 3,600 square feet space. Ideal for fitness use or repurpose – interior walls can be removed for open workspace.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Ideal for fitness use or repurpose
